traverseToSubWidget

public static ApplicationWidget traverseToSubWidget(ApplicationWidget root,
                                                    String path)
                                             throws AraneaJspException
Given a widget (root) and a (tree) path relative to that widget (tree root), returns the child widget according to the path. Fails with an exception when either root or path or any child widget on the path is null.

Parameters:
root - The required widget, which is the starting point for traversing.
path - The path to follow. The syntax of the path is expected to be the same as widget.getScope().toString() returns.
Returns:
The matching child widget.
Throws:
AraneaJspException - In case the root, the path or any path-matching child widget is null.
